mdRecord.dcterms:title: An Address Delivered by Dr. C. M. Stigleman before the Young Ladies of Jacksonville Female Academy, Floyd C. H., Va.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Newspaper article of an address delivered on June 30, 1876, “An Address – Delivered by Dr. C. M. Stigleman before the Young Ladies of Jacksonville Female Academy, Floyd C. H., Va.,” 3 photocopied pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Virginia
Newspapers
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
